## Program Details

**1. Name of the Program**
(e.g., Google Summer of Code)

**2. Official Website Link**
(Where can we read more about it?)

**3. Direct Application Link**
(Where do students/contributors apply?)

**4. Short Description**
(1-2 sentences about what the program is)

**5. Program Category**
- [ ] Mentorship
- [ ] Grant
- [ ] Fellowship
- [ ] Hackathon
- [ ] Internship

**6. Target Audience & Eligibility**
- Who can apply? (Students only, everyone, professionals?)
- Are there geographic restrictions? (Global, US-out, EU-only, etc.)

**7. Stipend / Compensation**
- Is it paid?
- If yes, what is the approximate amount in USD?

**8. Important Dates (Please specify year if known)**
- Applications Open:
- Applications Close:
- Program Start Date:
- Program End Date:
